value.title: Power BI Incremental Refresh and Hybrid Tables
value.excerpt: The default configuration for the Power BI dataset is to wipe out the entire data and reload it again. This can be a long process if you have a big dataset. value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
